i1.name: Way of the Wanderer
description: {{sbc|Innate - Intent:}} '''Yasuo''' doubles his {{as|{{sti|'''total''' critical strike chance}}}} from all other sources, but his {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} deal only {{as|{{critical damage|80|add=true}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Resolve:}} '''Yasuo''' generates {{tip|Flow}} for every {{passive progression/deprecated version|3|59 to 46|1 to 13}} units he travels by any means. At{{ft|100 stacks|{{passive progression/deprecated version|3|59*100 to 46*100|1 to 13}} units traveled}}and upon taking damage from enemy {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|monsters}}, '''Yasuo''' consumes all {{tip|Flow}} to {{tip|shield}} himself for {{passive progression/deprecated version|115;120;125;130;135;145;155;165;180;195;210;240;270;305;345;395;455;525}} for up to 1 second.
i1.notes:
* Taking into account '''Yasuo's''' {{as|345 '''base''' movement speed}} and assuming he's constantly moving, it will take {{passive progression/deprecated version|3|5900/345 to 4600/345|1 to 13}} seconds to generate 100 {{tip|Flow}} stacks.
** Taking into account the {{as|45 '''bonus''' movement speed}} that most [[boots|Tier 2 boots]] grant (resulting in {{as|390 '''total''' movement speed}}), it will take {{passive progression/deprecated version|3|5900/390 to 4600/390|1 to 13}} seconds to generate 100 {{tip|Flow}} stacks.

w1.name: Wind Wall
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' creates a gust of wind that travels in the target direction over {{tt|{{fd|0.25}} seconds|Estimated}} to form a wall in front of him. The wall slowly drifts forward 50 units over {{fd|3.75}} seconds, blocking all hostile non-{{tip|turret}} {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} that attempt to pass through it.
w1.notes:
* ''Wind Wall'' starts blocking projectiles on-cast (despite not being fully formed) and grants {{tip|sight}} over a small area.
* ''Wind Wall'' stops upon colliding with an enemy ''Wind Wall''.

e1.name: Sweeping Blade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|dashes}} a fixed distance toward the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} if they are in range upon arrival.
Each ''Sweeping Blade'' cast increases the next dash's '''base''' damage by 25% for 5 seconds, up to 50%.
'''Yasuo''' cannot dash to the same target more than once every few seconds.
'''''Yasuo''' will be {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by any {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} crowd control during Sweeping Blade.''
''{{ai|R|Yasuo}} can be cast during Sweeping Blade. If {{ai|Q|Yasuo}} has been buffered, {{ai|W|Yasuo}} may also be cast during it. {{bug|2}}''
e1.notes:
* ''Sweeping Blade's'' dash speed is affected by {{stil|movement speed}}.
* ''Sweeping Blade'' will generate {{fd|7.5}} {{tip|Flow}} stacks per cast that travels the maximum distance.
* '''Yasuo''' can use ''Sweeping Blade's'' fixed dash distance to cross walls both before and after hitting his target (provided his proximity to the wall and/or target allows it).

r1.name: Last Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yasuo''' {{tip|blinks}} to the other side of a {{tip|sight|visible}} {{tip|airborne}} enemy champion {{tt|nearest to the cursor|searches in a 1100 radius}}, instantly generating maximum {{tip|Flow}} while resetting {{ai|Steel Tempest|Yasuo|Steel Tempest's}} stacks.

Upon arrival, he {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target and all nearby {{tip|airborne}} enemy champions around it for 1 second, {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them and slashing them with his sword over the duration, dealing {{as|physical damage}} thereafter. Enemy champions around the target that become {{tip|airborne}} before the effects end will also be {{tip|airborne|knocked up}} for the remaining duration and dealt damage at its end.
For the next 15 seconds, '''Yasuo's''' {{tip|critical strikes}} gain {{sti|lethality|{{as|50% {{tt|'''bonus'''-armor penetration|Modifies bonus armor only}}}}}}.

''If '''Yasuo''' would be placed inside a ''{{tip|turret|turret's}}'' {{sti|attack range}} upon blinking, he will instead attempt to position himself outside it (does not apply to {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}).''
r1.notes:
* ''Last Breath'' requires the target to be affected by {{tip|airborne}} from an {{tt|enemy source|from the target's perspective}}, and simultaneously that the target is not considered {{tip|cc-immune}}, {{tip|displacement immune}}, or {{tip|untargetable}} during it.
** ''Last Breath'' cannot be cast if there are no nearby enemy champions that meet the conditions.
*** Attempting to cast the ability on an enemy champion that is not airborne will indicate that they "''Must Be Airborne!''"
** Self-applied or allied-applied {{tip|airborne|displacements}} do not allow ''Last Breath'' to target the champion. Those applied by the ''neutral'' team (e.g. {{uis|Dragon}} initial knock back) '''can''' be targeted.
** An [[spell indicator|indicator]] will be placed towards enemy champions that meet the cast conditions within range of ''Last Breath'' to signify the ability can be cast.
** {{ai|The Hextech Ultimatum|Camille}} will prevent '''Yasuo''' from casting ''Last Breath'' on an airborne enemy champion outside its borders.
*** '''Yasuo''' can only do so if the airborne enemy champion is inside the zone.
* '''Yasuo''' does not need {{tip|sight}} of enemy champions near his target to affect them with the ability.
* Even if the target is protected by {{tip|spell shield}} the ability will still affect them and deal damage, but the ''spell shield'' will be consumed.
* ''Last Breath'' can be fully {{tip|cleanse|cleansed}} but the damage is applied instantly after the {{tip|airborne}} removal.
** If '''Yasuo''' cannot finish ''Last Breath'' from certain circumstances, the animation time for him to perform the ability ends prematurely. This includes if there are {{tt|no targets left|Whether by death or cleanses}} for '''Yasuo''' to consider himself in animation time.
** It is not considered {{tip|suspension}} however.
* ''Last Breath'' cannot be {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|crowd control}}.
* If '''Yasuo''' {{tip|death|dies}} during the animation time, the target(s) will remain {{tip|airborne}} and the damage will still be applied.
* Terrain displacing abilities (e.g. {{ai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}, {{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn}}) that affect enemy champions are considered {{tip|airborne}}, and will therefore interact with ''Last Breath''.
* While ''blinking'', '''Yasuo''' creates an {{tip|untargetable}} ''clone'' of himself that cues a dashing animation (similarly to {{ai|Sweeping Blade|Yasuo}}) towards the target. This unit's rules do not follow those of a {{tip|clone|clone's}}. As such, it is more alike a champion, unless special cased.
